title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2429/94 of 6 October 1994 concerning imports of certain processed mushroom products originating in third countries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2429/94 of 6 October 1994 concerning imports of certain processed mushroom products originating in third countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Until 31 December 1994, the allocation of the overall quantity laid down in Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 1796/81 and set out in Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1707/90 shall be adjusted in accordance with the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the fifth day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 October 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 183, 4. 7. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 117, 1. 5. 1992, p. 98.

(5) OJ No L 155, 22. 6. 1994, p. 1.
